parameter.name: pollInterval
parameter.label: Poll Interval
parameter.description: Time between polling the data in ms.

parameter.name: maxTries
parameter.label: Maximum Tries When Reading
parameter.description: Number of tries when reading data, if some of the reading fail. For single try, enter 1.

parameter.name: littleEndian
parameter.label: Endianness
parameter.description: Little Endian (true; default) or Big Endian (false).
